summary: "Roseanne" is an American TV sitcom starring Roseanne Barr as the head of a working-class family in Illinois. It aired on ABC from 1988 to 1997 and was revived briefly in 2018. The show was popular, reaching No. 1 in ratings during its second season. It was praised for its realistic portrayal of an American family. However, the revival was canceled after Roseanne Barr made offensive comments on Twitter. ABC then created a spin-off called "The Conners" without Barr, which also became a ratings success.
title: Roseanne
